flat_static_buffer_base::consume

Remove bytes from beginning of the readable bytes.

Synopsis 
void
consume(
    std::size_t n);
Description

Removes n bytes from the beginning of the readable bytes. All buffers sequences previously obtained using data or prepare are invalidated.

Parameters

Name

Description

n

The number of bytes to remove. If this number is greater than the number of readable bytes, all readable bytes are removed.

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.
